
# Test Rule 1.
# - Broken
# - Creates an infinite loop between ec host and 170 host

RewriteEngine on
RewriteRule (.*) http://170.64.196.34/svgweb [P,L]

# Test Rule 2.
# - Auto generated by ventraip redirect
# - works to forward requests
# - does not retain proxy hostname

RewriteEngine on
RewriteCond %{HTTP_HOST} ^svgapp\.edwardcalderon\.com$ [OR]
RewriteCond %{HTTP_HOST} ^www\.svgapp\.edwardcalderon\.com$
RewriteRule ^/?$ "http\:\/\/170\.64\.196\.34\/svgweb" [R=301,L]
